Functions
CWebCamera
CWebCamera(
std::wstring deviceName,
int w = -1,
int h = -1,
int frameRate = 30
)

Default ctor for CWebCamera

Parameters
deviceName
std::wstring

symbolic link name for the requested device

w
int

width in pixels of camera resolution. If unspecified (w==-1) the maximum resolution is picked

h
int

height in pixels of camera resolution. If unspecified (w==-1) the maximum resolution is picked

frameRate
int

requested frame rate
